chemicals.name: Sulfites
chemicals.foods: Tomatoes and All Tomato Products, Grapes, Prunes, Raisins, Any Dried Fruit that doesn't say 'sulfite-free' on the packaging, Soybeans and Soy Products, Modified Flour, Modified Gluten, Barley Malt, Vinegar, Ketchup, Mustard, Sauerkraut, Pickles, Coleslaw, Soda

chemicals.name: Nitrites
chemicals.foods: Eggplants, Spinach, Tomatoes and All Tomato Products, Vinegar, Pickles, Cured Meats

chemicals.name: Nitrates
chemicals.foods: Leafy Green Vegetables, Beets, Cured, smoked, aged, processed, canned, or tenderized meats-like bacon, hot dogs, prosciutto, pepperoni, lunch meat, etc., Vinegar, Coleslaw

chemicals.name: Tyramine
chemicals.foods: avocados, eggplants, green-peas, olives, potatoes, snow peas, Tomatoes and Tomato Products, Bananas, Plums, Prunes, Raisins, Raspberries, Overripe Fruit, Cured, smoked, aged, processed, canned, or tenderized meats-like bacon, hot dogs, prosciutto, pepperoni, lunch meat, etc., Old/Leftover Meat, Liver from Any Animal, Any Game Meat, Fermented Dairy(Cheese, Sour Cream, etc.), Vinegar, Soy Sauce, Teriyaki Sauce, Fish Sauce, Miso, Pickles, Fermented Foods, Fermented Beverages...kombucha, Alcohol, Yeast

chemicals.name: Histamine
chemicals.foods: Eggplants, Olives,  Pumpkins, Spinach, Tomatoes, Apricots, Cherries,  Citrus: Oranges, Limes, Lemons, Grapefruit, Cranberries, Currants, Dates, Loganberries, Mulberries, Nectarines, Papayas, Peaches, Pineapples, Plums, Prunes, Raisins, Raspberries, Strawberries, Cured, smoked, aged, processed, canned, or tenderized meats-like bacon, hot dogs, prosciutto, pepperoni, lunch meat, etc., Pre-Ground Meat, Old/Leftover Meat, Liver, Any Game Meat, Fish and Shellfish, Fermented Dairy,  Soy, Red Beans, Bleached Flour, Vinegar, Fats or Oils that contain color or preservation, Ketchup, Mustard, Relish, Soy Sauce, Anise, Cinnamon, Clove, Curry Powder, Hot Paprika, Nutmeg, Prepared Foods Labelled with Spices, Chocolate, Flavored Gelatin, Artificial Sweeteners, Flavored Syrup, Prepared Desert Fillings, Prepared Icing or Frosting, Cake Decorations,  Commercial Candies, Mincemeat, Miso, Pickles,  Anything Fermented, Fruit Juices and Cocktails, Carbonated Beverages and Soda, Tea, All Drinks with Flavors or Spices, Fermented Beverages, Alcohol, Preservatives

chemicals.name: MSG
chemicals.foods: Takeout & Processed Foods, Any Fermented Dairy Products (Cheese, Sour Cream, Processed Cheese, Buttermilk, Yogurt, Kefir), Ketchup, Mustard, Sauerkraut, Fish Sauce, Prepared Foods Labeled with Spices, Pickles, All Drinks with Flavor or Spices, Preservatives, Yeast, Yeast Extract, Nutritional Yeast
